name: @guise/skeleton
description: Guise™ Skeleton: The simple, semantic, bare-bones CSS to hold your site together.
author: Garret Wilson <garret@globalmentor.com> (http://www.garretwilson.com/)

scripts.build: npm run build:copy-sources && npm run build:minify && npm run build:add-preambles && npm run build:add-charset && npm run build:insert-version && npm run package
scripts.build:add-preambles: foreach --no-c -g "dist/css/guise-skeleton-*.min.css" -x "preamble -o #{path} -p \" * Guise™ Skeleton x.x.x-SNAPSHOT #{base}\" -e src/main/resources/preamble-footer.css" && foreach --no-c -g "dist/css/guise-skeleton-*.min.css" -x "preamble -o #{path} -e src/main/resources/preamble-header.css"
